name: Raoul Pal The Journey Man
title: How TradFi Is Falling Behind | Raoul Pal & Joe McCann
text:
Synopsis
Traditional financial models fail to capture the value of intangible cultural assets, but tokenization could transform how we quantify and account for cultural value on corporate balance sheets.

Key Insights
- Traditional business education lacks curriculum for valuing culture and attention
- Current financial valuation methods (discounted cash flow, price-to-book) cannot effectively measure intangible cultural assets
- Cultural value is currently an intangible that does not get reflected in equity
- Tokenization could convert cultural assets from intangible to tangible balance sheet items
- Companies like Disney possess significant cultural value that is not currently quantified in traditional financial metrics
